attributes.action: Supply the Ukraine millitary with air defence systems and ground attack drones
attributes.additional_details: The Ukranian nation is fighting for survival day by day. The Russian millitary continue to target civilians, medical facilities, schools and infrastructure including nuclear power stations. As a country, Ukraine is experiencing an existential crisis and humanitarian disaster. Europe as a whole is also threatened, so the crisis is not confined within the borders of Ukraine. The moral case for further millitary support is unquestionable, If not me...Who? If not now...When?
attributes.background: The Ukrainian millitary and territorial defence forces are fighting to defend their land and way of life. Their resolve and bravery against a large invading force is remarkable. However, air capability and air defence is limited. Vehicle based SAM systems and drones would balance the fight.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open which you might like to sign:

Supply arms to the Ukrainian resistance in Russian-held territory
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610035

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314
